original_text: It is because of God's work that you now belong to Christ Jesus. As a result of Christ's death on the cross, we share in God's wise plan. Because we belong to Christ, God makes us right with himself. He makes us his own special people. He makes us free from the power of sin. It is because of God's work that you now belong to Christ Jesus. As a result of Christ's death on the cross, we share in God's wise plan. Because we belong to Christ, God makes us right with himself. He makes us his own special people. He makes us free from the power of sin.
korean_text: 너희는 하나님으로부터 나서 그리스도 예수 안에 있고 예수는 하나님으로부터 나와서 우리에게 지혜와 의로움과 거룩함과 구원함이 되셨으니

sentences.original_text: It is because of God's work
that you now belong to Christ Jesus
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 이제 그리스도 예수께 속하게 되었습니다

sentences.original_text: As a result of Christ's death on the cross
we share in God's wise plan
God makes us right with himself
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 우리를 자신과 올바른 관계로 만드십니다

sentences.original_text: He makes us his own special people
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 우리를 자신의 특별한 백성으로 만드십니다

sentences.original_text: He makes us free from the power of sin
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 우리를 죄의 권능으로부터 자유롭게 하십니다

sentences.original_text: It is because of God's work
that you now belong to Christ Jesus
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 이제 그리스도 예수께 속하게 되었습니다

we share in God's wise plan
God makes us right with himself
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 우리를 자신과 올바른 관계로 만드십니다

sentences.original_text: He makes us his own special people
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 우리를 자신의 특별한 백성으로 만드십니다

sentences.original_text: He makes us free from the power of sin
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 우리를 죄의 권능으로부터 자유롭게 하십니다
